name: 2048 Pokemons!⚡
description:
The best 2048 game for mobile 🏆, with funny Pokemons that will make your time positive and exciting! 

A funny puzzle game that will make the process of the game fun and call to mind the good old pokemons.
Combine pokemons and score the most points among friends!

HOW TO PLAY
Move the pokemon tiles in order to move them with your finger (slide up, down, left, right). Equal pokemon tiles are combined into a higher level pokemon.
Combining two pokeballs appears Pikachu, followed by Charmander. Discover all Pokemon! Try to collect the maximum amount of Pokemon and achieve the best result!

FEATURES<
✔ Beautiful and positive pokemons instead of numbers
✔ Connect two identical pokemon - and you get a new pokemon
✔ Move pokemon tiles up and down, right and left
✔ The entire screen is a gaming area
✔ View of game progress available
✔ Available button to undo last action
✔ Optimized work for mobile devices
✔ Added night mode, so that your eyes are always nice to play the game
Do not forget to tell friends and relatives about game :)
Have a fun game and a nice time!
